page.title: 10CHERRY LODGE GOLF COURSE
page.content:
A GOLF CLUB IN BIGGIN HILL
Cherry Lodge Golf Course was built in 1967 and opened in 1969; it is important for may people's recreation. Before, it was a fruit farm and was turned into a golf course because the farmer couldn't get people to pick the fruit. there are 883 members, 53 of which are women. The annual subscription is Â£310.50 for men, and Â£241.50 for women. The course covers 112 acres 70 are fairway, 5 are greens, 4 are tees and the rest is rough or semi-rough. There are 18 holes and the longest is 588 yards. There are 12 bunkers. About 35,000 rounds of golf are played there each year. The club house has a restaurant, a bar and a sauna. Three people work on the course full time; 40 people work part-time inside.
